newsitem.title: USA: Comsat OKs tax free spinoff of Ascent.
newsitem.headline: Comsat OKs tax free spinoff of Ascent.

text.p: COMSAT Corp said Friday that it approved a plan to distribute its 80.67 percent stake in Ascent Entertainment Group Inc to its shareholders through a tax-free dividend.
The company said it received a ruling from the Internal Revenue Service saying a spinoff would not be taxable to the corporation or its shareholders.
